Name: Power Of Language
About the game: Power Of Language is a suspense text game mainly featuring dialogues. The game is about a case caused by a certain mental illness in the future, and you’d act as a hypnotist to talk to prisoners for investigations that eventually lead to the truth. Besides, you need to be careful of every tiny clue contained in memory scenes. The plot lasts for 40 to 60 minutes. . A dialogue-based game. . It’s about a case caused by a certain mental illness. . You’d investigate an unbelievable case to figure out the truth through dialogues and memory scenes. . The story happens at some time of the future, and you’d select dialogue contents or talk to prisoners. . Check out every item in the memory scenes and save the screenshots, which will be very helpful for your search of the truth.
